details.company: I Apparel International Group PTE LTD (Cambodia)
details.position: Front End Web Development and Design Manager
responsibilities: Responsible in developing new applications and/or modules and ensuring the applications meet high-quality standards and fulfill business requirements.

Conducts thorough code reviews to maintain code quality, consistency, and adherence to best practices. Provides constructive feedback to team members, helping them improve their coding skills and ensuring the overall integrity of the codebase.

Mentors and assists junior developers in overcoming challenges, understanding complex tasks, and resolving blockers. Provides guidance and support to help them meet their tasks' requirements and deadlines, fostering their professional growth within the team.
Responsible for developing new features and modules and ensuring the applications meet high-quality standards and fulfill business requirements.
Responsible for application maintenance across the frontend codebase.

Offers daily support to end-users by addressing their inquiries and resolving any issues they encounter while using the web applications. Provides prompt and effective solutions, ensuring a positive user experience and customer satisfaction.

Responsible for developing sophisticated and user-friendly web applications utilizing Angular and ReactJS frameworks. Involved in the entire software development lifecycle, from conceptualization to deployment, ensuring the applications meet high-quality standards and fulfill business requirements.

Takes on the role of Team Lead for the frontend development team. Leads by example, setting coding standards, best practices, and ensuring effective collaboration within the team. Provides direction and guidance to team members, fostering a cohesive and productive working environment

Actively contribute to the creation of high-quality, bug-free software while maintaining industry-standard coding practices and fostering a culture of collaboration and excellence within the frontend development team.

Acts as a critical troubleshooter, meticulously identifying, analyzing, and resolving bugs and issues within existing web applications. Utilizes debugging tools and methodologies to pinpoint the root causes of problems and implements effective solutions promptly, ensuring the smooth operation of the applications and minimizing user disruptions
Conducts rigorous code reviews, evaluating the quality, efficiency, and adherence to industry standards of frontend code.
Engages in peer programming sessions, ensuring that the team's collective knowledge and expertise are leveraged for optimal outcomes.
